title: Weni Agentic IA
description: An enterprise AI-based CX SOLUTION for brands and retailers.

improve.description: Connect agents to the Weni platform to access advanced features and customizable options.

order_status.title: Order status agent
order_status.description: Keep customers updated on their order status in real time.

details.title: Enable order delivery tracking for customers.
details.description: This agent reduces manual checks and increase transparency, ensuring customers stay informed and in control.

is_test_contact_number.title: Restrict to test contact number
is_test_contact_number.description: Agent will message only the test phone number

is_selected_sellers.title: Restricted for selected sellers
is_selected_sellers.description: Agent will message only selected sellers

abandoned_cart.title: Abandoned cart agent
abandoned_cart.description: Recover sales by reminding customers of items left in the cart.

details.title: Recover sales by reminding customers of items left in the cart.
details.description: This agent increases conversion, retains customers and encourages order completion.

setup.title: Setting up your Weni App
setup.description: Getting everything ready for you! We're finalizing the initial setup to ensure a smooth experience.

details.title: Intelligent agents
details.description: Enhance intelligent agents by enabling control over conversation flows based on user intentions. With the Starter Plan, customize language, tone, and behavior to give the agent a unique identity and improve communication quality. See the demonstration of the exchange and return agent interaction on the side.

objective.title: Objective (optional)
objective.default: Your goal is to answer customer questions, inform the order status, provide product information, and sell. Your main features are: Shopping on WhatsApp and FAQ.

knowledge.title: Knowledge source
knowledge.context: Provide the content your agent will use to answer questions.

agent.error: Unable to set the agent. Please try again later.

integration.description: Choose the channel you want to use and follow the step by step to add it.

whatsapp.description: Utilize an enterprise WhatsApp account to enhance communication with contacts.

terms.title: Terms and conditions
terms.description1: VTEX and the Contractor have entered into a Master Services Agreement ("Agreement") to establish authorization for the use and provision of support and maintenance services for the Software developed by VTEX for e-commerce solutions. VTEX and the Contractor, together, will hereinafter be referred to as the "Parties" and, individually, as a "Party."
terms.description2: The Contractor's Admin Master on the VTEX Platform, duly authorized to act on behalf of the Contractor, with all powers and obligations related to this authorization, accepts and acknowledges the provisions of these Terms and Conditions - Weni Platform by VTEX (“T&C”), binding the Parties and their successors, under any circumstances, to be governed by the following clauses:

description.1: 1.1 VTEX, through the Weni Platform by VTEX, provides a service to support the Contractor in communicating with its customers through multiple widely used messaging channels, including but not limited to WhatsApp, SMS, and Webchat.
description.2: 1.2 Subject to the conditions set forth in this T&C, VTEX will make the Weni Platform by VTEX available and grant the Contractor a non-exclusive right to access and use the Weni Platform by VTEX for its internal business purposes.

description.1: 2.1 The Contractor will be solely responsible for the content of all communications sent by its users through the Weni Platform by VTEX, as well as for compliance with all applicable laws and regulations related to the activities carried out.
description.2: 2.2 The Contractor expressly agrees to update its policies and terms of use and to obtain the express consent of its consumers, where applicable, to send information about services via email, SMS, WhatsApp, and other communication channels, with VTEX being exempt from this responsibility.
description.3: 2.3 The Contractor acknowledges and agrees to the WhatsApp Business Solution Terms, available at https://www.whatsapp.com/legal/meta-terms-whatsapp-business, including any future updates. The Contractor also acknowledges that it cannot use the Weni Platform by VTEX to track or create individual profiles of WhatsApp users for any business entity; track, create, sell, or distribute any data derived from the Weni Platform by VTEX; or engage in other actions prohibited by the applicable terms established by META, the company responsible for maintaining the WhatsApp Business solution.

description.1: 3.1 VTEX, provided that the Contractor fulfills its obligations, commits to maintaining the services operational for at least 99.00% of the month for the Weni Platform by VTEX. The Parties agree that cases in which any Service Level Agreement (SLA) non-compliance is caused by instabilities from META or third parties involved are excluded. The SLA ("Measured SLA") is calculated by considering the total minutes in the measured month, subtracting any downtime recorded in the same period. Downtime means that the Weni Platform by VTEX is unavailable for access and use by the Contractor and other internet connections, excluding cases of (1) planned maintenance, (2) force majeure events, or (3) issues arising from improper use of the Weni Platform by VTEX by the Contractor or proven failure of the Contractor to fulfill its obligations.
description.2: 3.2 If the SLA is not met as described above, and provided that all Contractor obligations have been met, Service Credits will be granted in an amount equal to 10% (ten percent) of the monthly fees paid by the Contractor to VTEX for the Weni Platform by VTEX, to be applied to the next invoice after the downtime calculation. To receive Service Credits, the Contractor must submit a request via VTEX's support system within 10 (ten) days after the end of the month in which the downtime occurred, as per the Agreement between the Parties.

description.1: 4.1 The Parties agree that the modules included in the Weni Platform by VTEX comprise: Flows Module; Studio Module; Artificial Intelligence Module; Integration Module; Chat Module; SDK for mobile applications; WhatsApp Business API; and Unlimited agent license in Weni Chat.
description.2: 4.2 As Parties agree that the services and support included in the Weni Platform by VTEX comprise: Environment creation in the Weni Platform; Hosting of the Weni Platform; Up to six (6) hours of training; Updates and improvements to the Weni Platform by VTEX; and Support.

description.1: 5.1 The Parties agree that the Contractor's Onboarding will take place within 5 business days after payment of the annual licensing fee, provided that the Contractor provides the necessary contact information required by VTEX.
description.2: 5.2 The Parties agree that the project will be executed after the payment of the annual licensing fee.
description.3: 5.3 The terms of this T&C take effect from the date of signing for a period of 12 (twelve) months, with the contract term being automatically renewed for additional equivalent periods unless one Party notifies the other, in writing, at least thirty (30) days before the term's expiration, of its intention not to renew the T&C.

4.title: 5.4 This T&C may be terminated by either party at the end of the 12 (twelve) months without penalty or indemnification, provided that if VTEX terminates the agreement, the Contractor is notified at least 90 (ninety) days in advance, and if the Contractor terminates the agreement, VTEX is notified at least 90 (ninety) days in advance.

items.1: 5.4.1 If the Contractor decides to unilaterally terminate the Agreement before the end of the 12-month Term, it must pay VTEX the contracted monthly licensing fee as specified in clause 6.1, multiplied by the number of months remaining until the end of the 12-month Term established in this Addendum.

description.1: 6.1 The Contractor shall pay VTEX the amounts indicated in the table below, according to the chosen plan, upon presentation of an invoice by VTEX, as established in the Agreement.

rows.feature: Annual licensing fee (Cloud hosting, deliveries, and continuous updates)
Monthly licensing fee (maintenance, monitoring, and support)
Outbound CX Notification (order tracking, invoice sending, payment notification, etc.)

description.2: 6.2 The values foreseen in this T&C will be charged in the VTEX invoice to the Contractor, respecting the same payment conditions stipulated in the previously signed Agreement between the Parties.

description.1: 7.1 This T&C will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the law stipulated in the Agreement and any dispute between the Parties that cannot be resolved by mutual agreement will be resolved exclusively in accordance with the Agreement.
description.2: 7.2 Any delay in any payment by the Contractor for more than 15 (fifteen) days will authorize VTEX, until the payment of the unpaid invoices, to limit access to the solution provided by the Weni Platform by VTEX.
description.3: 7.3 The Contractor acknowledges that the Weni Platform by VTEX utilizes external technology platforms, including but not limited to those offered by the META corporate entity. The Contractor acknowledges that any changes, limitations, or suspensions of the Weni Platform by VTEX due to determinations by the META corporate entity will be communicated to the Contractor as soon as possible by VTEX, even if in a form different from that set forth in this T&C, without VTEX being considered in violation of these terms.
description.4: 7.4 The Parties ratify all other provisions of the Agreement that are not expressly revoked or altered by this Addendum, and those that apply to this instrument. In case of conflict between the Agreement and this Addendum, the provisions of this Addendum will prevail.

terms.description: By using this application, acceptance of the Terms and Conditions is required. These terms define access to and use of the services, detailing the selected plan's features, limitations, pricing, and renewal policies. Additionally, they outline product functionality, usage guidelines, and any applicable restrictions to ensure a secure and optimal experience.

plan_details.title: 1. Plan Details
plan_details.description: Your selected plan includes specific features, limitations, and billing terms. Please check your subscription details to understand what is included and how renewals work.

product_usage.title: 2. Product Usage
product_usage.description: This application is designed to enhance your experience through specific features and functionalities. Any misuse, unauthorized access, or violation of the terms may result in account suspension.
